attributes.action: ensure people realise Lowestoft is in Suffolk, not Norfolk!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm fed up of people saying Lowestoft are in Norfolk, when they're actually Suffolk! I think Gordon Brown should address the nation,s o everyone knows the facts!

rejection.details: Your petition does not make a point about government policy.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
